item.description: class: center middle bg-primary text-light RemarkJS - CSS Guide Hugo Theme | Notebook-Searcher Background class: center middle bg-primary text-light Center list .blockquote-info[ > ### Guide > Use .fit-content.mx-auto to create a centered list ] .center[ Example .fit-content.mx-auto[ - apple - orange - pear ] ] class: center This is normal image But the image is too .text-danger[big] class: center img-100 class to set max width to 100% .
